definitions.definition: Any of a class of inert , semi - inorganic polymeric compounds ( polysiloxanes ), that have a wide range of thermal stability and extreme water repellence , used in a very wide range of industrial applications , and in prosthetic replacements for body parts .

main_definition: ( chemistry ) Any of a class of inert , semi - inorganic polymeric compounds ( polysiloxanes ), that have a wide range of thermal stability and extreme water repellence , used in a very wide range of industrial applications , and in prosthetic replacements for body parts .
